biotools.summary: Computational method for identifying and characterizing small molecules binding sites for receptors of known three-dimensional structure. Binding sites are identified using energetic aspects to select high affinity points in space around the receptor, and a clustering technique for segregating these points into clusters called fills and corresponding to potential binding pockets.

bioschemas.name: AutoSite
